_sText:
This is my first deathrun map, it's kinda simple in terms of detail but all the traps and everything else works just fine as far as I know.

Features:

• 16 Traps - 14 Controlled by the TR's, 1 Random, 1 Skill.

• 3 Endings - Bhop, Knife, Spawn.

• 4 Secrets - 10 Special smoke grenades.

• Some parts of the floor break when touched.

• Anti-AFK

• 56 Spawn Points - 54 CT's and 2 TR's.

• Trap's button, when pressed, is locked and has a delay of 25 seconds until it can be pressed again.


I also included a text file with the secrets location in the .RAR file, just extract it and open in the notepad. 

If there are any bugs, please report them and I'll fix as soon as possible.

Thanks!
